messages.message:
Feature request: Edit last utterance/query in Converse

I'd love to be able to edit the last message I've submitted in a Converse session, as there's often:
• moments when I have made a mistake and need to correct the query
• situations where I want to test the performance/result of a certain query
• times when a query provided a dissatisfactory result and I want to change it
• tasks that require creating an example/demo and I need to correct a query
• instances when I don't want my last query to be a part of the conversational context and affecting any subsequent turns
... without having to restart the entire session.

Created a feature request from this https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3363


cc: @margaret.tomaszczuk
